p:
Non-coding long-chain RNA (LncRNA) and micro-RNA (miRNA) affect ovarian growth, cell proliferation, ageing and apoptosis
6 . LncRNA and miRNAs are co-integrated and regulate all aspects of ovarian tissue development. Even though LncRNA does not encode proteins, it has been shown to have a transcriptional and post-transcriptional effect on gene functions as it is commonly involved in different physiological processes
21 . LncRNA and miRNAs play an important part in the regulation of ovary maturation, ovarian cells development, and hormone secretion
22 . Furthermore, the integration of LncRNA and miRNAs allows a thorough study of their regulatory mechanisms in ovarian growth at the molecular level
6 .
